name: Light's Last Hope
description:
Created by @GE0Gianni

3D / Third Person Shooter / Soulslike

Join light as she traverses through a souls/roguelike dungeon. Fight your way through hordes of goblins and pests as you try to bring the last pure light back to the world.

Controls:

Move-  WASD

Shoot- LMB

Jump- SPACE

Interact- E

Drop Torch- P

Mute Music- M
